title: Fastai factory approach using mask images
description: I'm currently doing the fastai practical deep learning course. An option for lesson 3's homework was to try out a segmentation problem, so this seemed like a good opportunity to do that. To keep things simple I kept it to just the 27 main apparel items (no apparel parts or attributes), and I converted run-encoded pixels to png images to feed into the standard SegmentationItemList. Improvement areas:  Create a custom SegmentationItemList that takes the run length enconded masks directly (as is done in internueron's kernel) Use more data, currently limited to ~10% of the training images (5k) to save time Use larger images, currently using 224x224 images to save time  I may work on the above, but for now am going to continue with the course. Maybe this kernel helps others.
